subject: Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Kimi Raikkonen held off the Force India driver Giancarlo Fisichella to win the Belgian Grand Prix on Sunday, the Ferrari driver's fourth triumph at the high-speed track in the past five years.
snippet: Kimi Raikkonen held off the Force India driver Giancarlo Fisichella to win the Belgian Grand Prix on Sunday, the Ferrari driver's fourth triumph at the high-speed track in the past five years.
